text:
:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

Hello,
I have a workflow that tracks and sends submissions from a HubSpot form to an external endpoint, the trigger works fine, when the data is received I am getting all the submissions. Is it possible to only send the current form submission only?

Hi everyone!
I need help with the below:

Something came up in our trading meeting today that I've been tasked to look into — we'd like to see if we can find out how many of our web bookings are calling the call centre before they book online. Theoretically, the information should be there, as there would be a record of a call on HubSpot before the online booking went through. Do you know if it's possible to build a report on this?

Hey Team

I run a sales agency and need help integrating multiple Lemlist accounts with a single HubSpot account. My goal is to see all campaigns a contact has participated in, along with their actions, directly within HubSpot. I tried using Zapier, but it required setting up separate Zaps for each campaign, which isn’t scalable. Has anyone successfully solved this? Would APIs allow me to connect multiple Lemlist accounts efficiently? 

Any guidance would be greatly appreciated

I personally know nothing about Lemlist - but I do see it has a developer API.  This means a developer (you or someone you hire) could develop an integration to get data from LemList and import that data (sync) with HubSpot.  If you have onstaff developers they will be able to learn this.  If not hire someone to do the integration you need.  <https://developer.lemlist.com/?utm_source=google&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=Digi_BRANDED_Lemlist_Brand_Exact&utm_content=163231161263&utm_term=lemlist&gadid=705480277570&gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAiAtYy9BhBcEiwANWQQLzVKNgdAoNAHrZfiKEg6wYbX_Z9iU7nUJ247R1caqst2s31dFdremhoCHewQAvD_BwE&_gl=1*dgukfg*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE3Mzg3Nzk3NTAuQ2p3S0NBaUF0WXk5QmhCY0Vpd0FOV1FRTHpWS05nZEFvTkFIclpmaUtFZzZ3WWJYX1o5aVU3blVKMjQ3UjFjYXFzdDJzMzFkRmRyZW1ob0NIZXdRQXZEX0J3RQ..*_gcl_au*MTc3MjczMTcyNS4xNzM4Nzc5NzUw*_ga*OTM3ODE4OTg5LjE3Mzg3Nzk3NTA.*_ga_RYKGGX498F*MTczODc3OTc1MC4xLjEuMTczODc3OTgxMi4wLjAuMA..*_ga_XRXQRF7W03*MTczODc3OTc1MC4xLjEuMTczODc3OTgxMi42MC4wLjExNTkyMzY2NTA>.
Thanks for the help! Scott, I'll try it out
good application for an App Card UI Extension - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/build-app-cards>
Anyone having issues with Gravity form submissions not going to HubSpot even though the HS tracking code is installed on the page?
